subject: Philosophy
title: Living Toward Death
description: A fast breakdown of Living Toward Death for builders.

hook.text: Heidegger said most people live as if they'll never die. That's why they waste their lives.

discovery.text: When you accept that your time is finite, trivial concerns fall away. Priorities crystallize.

twist.text: This isn't morbid. It's the opposite. Death-awareness makes every day more vivid and urgent.

climax.text: Steve Jobs said remembering death helped him make the biggest choices of his life.
